title: Gift Back Pettiness ( Queen Afua interview)
itunes:title: Gift Back Pettiness ( Queen Afua interview)
description:
Today on the show we had the master of holistic healing Queen Afua and her son stop by where she spoke about how she became a holistic healer, womb wellness, dieting and her book "Sacred Woman: A Guide to Healing the Feminine Body, Mind, and Spirit". Also, we open up the phone lines to see if our listeners take back gifts after a break up, once rumors broke about Quavo taking back his bentley gift to Saweetie after their break up. Charlamagne also gives his "Donkey of the Day" to a man that. cared more about his cell phone than his child while trespassing in a elephant exhibit.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
